(Ok, I agree that bitch, fuck, $hit, and swear words as harsh as that 
shouldn't be used as insults or that much.  But "IBM computer" and "Qwest 
internet" as insults?  No, no, I'm sorry, but that's just kind of dumb.  
There is slag, piece of scrap metal, etc.  BUt "Son of an IBM computer." in 
the NBW is just kind of dumb.  I doubt anyone in the BW would know what an 
IBM computer was, let alone take it as an insult, but it's your choice, 
that's just my opinion on the subject and I had to say it)
